bio: His blurb reads “Flies through space with jet thrusters and defeats evil on the moon!” But his suit is too small to show off his muscles.

soultimate.name: Wide Thunder Beam
soultimate.description: Fires a giant beam of light that can hit faraway foes.

skill.effect: 50% more likely to crit at max dist, doesn't stack.
skill.name: Sniper

name: Captain Thunder
